data.name: Home.MetaDescription
data.value: Discover high-quality clothing and textiles. Shop men's and women's fashion with free shipping on orders over 200 PLN.

data.name: Product_SelectOptions
data.value: Select size and color to add to cart

data.name: Error_AddToCart
data.value: Failed to add product to cart

data.name: Footer_Brand_Description
data.value: Discover premium textile products that combine comfort, quality, and style. Your trusted source for fashion excellence.

data.name: FAQ_Subtitle
data.value: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

data.name: FAQ_NoResults_Text
data.value: Try different keywords or browse all categories

data.name: FAQ_NeedHelp_Text
data.value: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer support team is here to help.

data.name: FAQ_Q1_Answer
data.value: Kokomija is a premium online fashion retailer offering high-quality clothing and textiles for both men and women. We curate the latest trends and timeless classics to help you express your unique style.

data.name: FAQ_Q2_Answer
data.value: We are based in Poland and ship to customers across Europe. Our warehouse is located in Warsaw, ensuring fast and reliable delivery to your doorstep.

data.name: FAQ_Q3_Title
data.value: How do I place an order?

data.name: FAQ_Q3_Answer
data.value: Simply browse our products, select your desired size and color, and add items to your cart. When ready, proceed to checkout, enter your shipping information, and complete payment. You'll receive an order confirmation email immediately.

data.name: FAQ_Q4_Title
data.value: Can I modify or cancel my order?

data.name: FAQ_Q4_Answer
data.value: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it. After this time, orders are processed and shipped. Please contact our customer service immediately if you need to make changes.

data.name: FAQ_Q5_Answer
data.value: Yes! We offer elegant gift wrapping on all orders. Simply select the gift wrapping option during checkout and add a personalized message for the recipient. Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion.

data.name: FAQ_Q6_Answer
data.value: Standard shipping is 15 PLN for orders under 200 PLN. We offer FREE shipping on all orders over 200 PLN. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for 25 PLN.

data.name: FAQ_Q7_Answer
data.value: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days within Poland. For international orders, delivery typically takes 5-10 business days depending on your location. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.

data.name: FAQ_Q8_Answer
data.value: Yes, we ship to most European countries. International shipping costs vary by destination. Additional customs fees may apply for non-EU countries and are the responsibility of the customer.

data.name: FAQ_Q9_Answer
data.value: Absolutely! Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also track your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

data.name: FAQ_Q10_Answer
data.value: We offer a 14-day return policy from the date of delivery, in accordance with Allegro standards. Items must be unworn, unwashed, with original tags attached. Returns are free for Polish customers. International return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility.

data.name: FAQ_Q11_Title
data.value: How do I initiate a return?

data.name: FAQ_Q11_Answer
data.value: Log into your account, go to "My Orders," select the order you want to return, and click "Request Return." Choose the items and reason, and we'll provide you with a return label and instructions.

data.name: FAQ_Q12_Title
data.value: When will I receive my refund?

data.name: FAQ_Q12_Answer
data.value: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect your returned items. The refund will be credited to your original payment method through Stripe's secure system. Bank processing times may vary by 2-3 additional business days.

data.name: FAQ_Q13_Answer
data.value: Yes! We offer free exchanges for different sizes or colors. Simply indicate "Exchange" when initiating your return, and specify your preferred replacement. We'll ship it as soon as we receive your original item.

data.name: FAQ_Q14_Title
data.value: What payment methods do you accept?

data.name: FAQ_Q14_Answer
data.value: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), digital wallets, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through Stripe, the world's leading payment platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

data.name: FAQ_Q15_Answer
data.value: 100% secure. All transactions are processed through Stripe with military-grade SSL encryption and PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance (the highest security standard). Your payment information is never stored on our servers â€“ Stripe handles everything securely. Our membership system is also fully powered by Stripe for maximum security.

data.name: FAQ_Q16_Answer
data.value: Our premium membership is managed entirely through Stripe, ensuring 100% secure recurring payments. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your membership at any time directly from your account dashboard. All billing is transparent with no hidden fees.

data.name: FAQ_Q17_Answer
data.value: Yes! Enter your discount code at checkout to apply it to your order. Codes cannot be combined with other promotions. Sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive discount codes and early access to sales.

data.name: FAQ_Q18_Title
data.value: Do I need an account to place an order?

data.name: FAQ_Q18_Answer
data.value: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, save multiple addresses, view order history, and receive exclusive member benefits and discounts.

data.name: FAQ_Q19_Title
data.value: How do I reset my password?

data.name: FAQ_Q19_Answer
data.value: Click "Login" at the top of the page, then select "Forgot Password?" Enter your email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. The link is valid for 24 hours.

data.name: FAQ_Q20_Title
data.value: How do I update my account information?

data.name: FAQ_Q20_Answer
data.value: Log into your account and go to "Account Settings." From there, you can update your email, password, shipping addresses, and communication preferences. Changes are saved automatically.

data.name: FAQ_Q21_Title
data.value: How can I contact customer service?

data.name: FAQ_Q21_Answer
data.value: You can reach us via email at support@kokomija.com, or use the contact form on our website. We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

data.name: FAQ_Q22_Title
data.value: How do I find the right size?

data.name: FAQ_Q22_Answer
data.value: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with measurements. We recommend measuring yourself and comparing to our size charts. If you're between sizes, we suggest ordering the larger size for comfort.

data.name: Contact_Subtitle
data.value: Get in touch with us for any questions or inquiries

data.name: Contact_SuccessMessage
data.value: Thank you for contacting us! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

data.name: Contact_ErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

data.name: CookieConsent.Message
data.value: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, personalize content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

data.name: CookieConsent.LearnMore
data.value: Learn more in our Privacy Policy

data.name: CookieCategory.EssentialDesc
data.value: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to your actions such as logging in or filling in forms.

data.name: CookieCategory.PreferencesDesc
data.value: These cookies allow the website to remember your choices (such as your language or theme preference) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

data.name: CookieCategory.AnalyticsDesc
data.value: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

data.name: CookieCategory.MarketingDesc
data.value: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements for individual users.

data.name: Privacy_MetaDescription
data.value: Learn how Kokomija protects your privacy and data. Information about Stripe payments, Cloudflare security, account management, and loyalty benefits.

data.name: Privacy_MetaKeywords
data.value: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, Stripe, Cloudflare, security, account management

data.name: Privacy_Subtitle
data.value: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

data.name: Privacy_Intro_Text
data.value: Welcome to Kokomija. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights.

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Text
data.value: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Name_Desc
data.value: To personalize your experience and process orders

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Email_Desc
data.value: For account creation, order confirmations, and communication

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Phone_Desc
data.value: For delivery updates and customer support

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Payment_Desc
data.value: Securely processed by Stripe (we never store full card details)

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Cookies_Desc
data.value: To remember your preferences and improve your experience

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Usage_Desc
data.value: Pages visited, time spent, and browsing patterns

data.name: Privacy_InfoCollect_Device_Desc
data.value: IP address, browser type, and device identifiers

data.name: Privacy_Stripe_Text
data.value: All payment transactions are processed by Stripe, a PCI-DSS Level 1 certified payment processor. Stripe handles all payment card information securely.

data.name: Privacy_Stripe_Important_Text
data.value: Stripe is responsible for the security and privacy of all payment information. We never store your complete credit card details on our servers.

data.name: Privacy_Stripe_Process
data.value: When you make a purchase, your payment information is encrypted and transmitted directly to Stripe's secure servers. Stripe complies with industry-leading security standards and is regularly audited for compliance.

data.name: Privacy_Stripe_LearnMore
data.value: Learn more about Stripe's privacy practices

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_Text
data.value: We use Cloudflare to protect our website and your data with enterprise-grade security features:

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_DDoS_Desc
data.value: Protects against malicious attacks to ensure website availability

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_SSL_Desc
data.value: All data transmitted is encrypted using industry-standard protocols

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_CDN_Desc
data.value: Fast and secure content delivery from servers closest to you

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_WAF_Desc
data.value: Blocks malicious traffic and protects against common vulnerabilities

data.name: Privacy_Cloudflare_LearnMore
data.value: Learn more about Cloudflare's privacy policy

data.name: Privacy_Use_Communication
data.value: Communicate with you about your orders and account

data.name: Privacy_Use_Improve
data.value: Improve our website, products, and services

data.name: Privacy_Use_Marketing
data.value: Send you marketing communications (with your consent)

data.name: Privacy_Use_Fraud
data.value: Detect and prevent fraud and security issues

data.name: Privacy_Account_Text
data.value: You have full control over your account and personal data. You can easily:

data.name: Privacy_Account_Update_Desc
data.value: Edit your personal details, addresses, and preferences anytime

data.name: Privacy_Account_Delete_Desc
data.value: Permanently remove your account and associated data

data.name: Privacy_Account_View_Desc
data.value: Access all personal information we store about you

data.name: Privacy_Account_Export_Desc
data.value: Download your data in a portable format

data.name: Privacy_Loyalty_Text
data.value: Registered customers and returning shoppers receive exclusive advantages through our loyalty program:

data.name: Privacy_Security_Text
data.value: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

data.name: Privacy_Security_Encryption
data.value: End-to-end encryption for all sensitive data

data.name: Privacy_Cookies_Text
data.value: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website traffic. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

data.name: Privacy_Cookies_Manage
data.value: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent banner.

data.name: Privacy_Retention_Text
data.value: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy or as required by law. When data is no longer needed, it is securely deleted or anonymized.

data.name: Privacy_ThirdParty_Text
data.value: We work with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our business:

data.name: Privacy_Rights_Text
data.value: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

data.name: Privacy_Rights_Access
data.value: Right to access your personal data

data.name: Privacy_Rights_Erasure
data.value: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")

data.name: Privacy_Rights_Withdraw
data.value: Right to withdraw consent at any time

data.name: Privacy_Contact_Text
data.value: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

data.name: Privacy_Changes_Text
data.value: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

data.name: Blog_Subtitle
data.value: Discover fashion trends, style tips, and the latest news from the textile world

data.name: Blog_NoPostsDesc
data.value: Sorry, we couldn't find any blog posts matching your criteria. Try adjusting your filters or search query.

data.name: Blog_NewsletterDesc
data.value: Subscribe to get the latest articles and fashion tips delivered to your inbox.

data.name: Blog_AuthorDefaultBio
data.value: Passionate about fashion and textiles, sharing insights and trends with our community.
